Package login

Class LoginAdmin

java.lang.Object
login.LoginAdmin
public class LoginAdmin
extends java.lang.Object
This class provides a login system for the admin. In deep, check if the credentials that have been inserted from the admin are correct or not, comparing the users credentials stored in user_credentials stored on MongoBB

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    LoginAdmin()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addAdmin()
    Add the admin figure to the user_credentials collection with name and password
    java.lang.Object getNameAdmin​(java.lang.String username)
    Executes the comparison between the name that the admin has inserted and the username stored in mongoDB collection that store all the users' name and passwords.
    java.lang.Object getPwdAdmin​(java.lang.String password)
    Executes the comparison between the password that the admin has inserted and the username stored in mongoDB collection that store all the users' name and passwords.
    boolean logIn()

    clone, equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • getNameAdmin

      public java.lang.Object getNameAdmin​(java.lang.String username)
      Executes the comparison between the name that the admin has inserted and the username stored in mongoDB collection that store all the users' name and passwords.
      Parameters:
      username - : the admin's name coming from the input scanner
      Returns:
      name: the admin's name

    • getPwdAdmin

      public java.lang.Object getPwdAdmin​(java.lang.String password)
      Executes the comparison between the password that the admin has inserted and the username stored in mongoDB collection that store all the users' name and passwords.
      Parameters:
      password - : the user's password coming from the input scanner
      Returns:
      pwd: the user's password
